sentences.en: Agreement in Cairo should be topped by an end to the oil embargo in Riyadh.
sentences.cn: 继在开罗达成了协议之后,应当在利雅得设法结束石油禁运.

sentences.en: Britain was signalling its readiness to have the embargo lifted.
sentences.cn: 英国表示愿意取消贸易禁令。

sentences.en: During the War of 1812, Congress laid an embargo on commerce with Great Britain.
sentences.cn: 1812年战争期内国会下令停止与英国通商.

sentences.en: During the war, they laid an embargo on commerce with enemy countries.
sentences.cn: 在战争期间, 他们禁止与敌国通商.

sentences.en: Egypt also enforced enforces the embargo embargo on Gaza.
sentences.cn: 埃及也禁止了往加沙的航运.

sentences.en: Gasoline prices went sky - high during the oil embargo.
sentences.cn: 石油禁运期间油价涨得像天一样高.

sentences.en: He revoked the ban on smoking; lift an embargo.
sentences.cn: 他废除了禁烟令; 废除了一项禁运法令.

sentences.en: However, the oil embargo in 1973 so that the whole situation changed.
sentences.cn: 但1973年石油禁运使整个情势改观.

sentences.en: Mary said: " I lay no embargo on anybody's words. "
sentences.cn: 玛丽说: “ 我不禁止任何人讲话. ”

sentences.en: Several countries embargoed arms shipments to Yugoslavia.
sentences.cn: 好几个国家对南斯拉夫实行武器禁运。

sentences.en: Since Cyprus has a veto over that decision, the embargo has stuck.
sentences.cn: 由于(希族)塞浦路斯已经拥有了对此决议的否决权, 贸易禁运也已继续维持.

sentences.en: The country has put an embargo on all imports.
sentences.cn: 该国对所有进口品实行禁运.

sentences.en: The embargo impacted on export revenues.
sentences.cn: 禁运对出口总收入有很大的影响.

sentences.en: The new taxes will lay an embargo on the store's future prosperity.
sentences.cn: 新增税额将限制该公司的发展前途.

sentences.en: The port of London laid an embargo on all ships coming from the Baltic.
sentences.cn: 伦敦港禁止所有来自波罗的海的船只入港.

sentences.en: The United Nations imposed an arms embargo against the country.
sentences.cn: 联合国对该国施行了武器贸易禁运。

sentences.en: They embargoed oil shipments to the U.S.
sentences.cn: 他们禁止了对美国石油船运。

sentences.en: This country put an oil embargo on an enemy country.
sentences.cn: 该国对敌国实行石油禁运.

trans.tran_en: an official order to stop trade with another country
an official order to stop trade with another country
to officially stop particular goods being traded with another country

trans.tran_cn: 禁止， 禁止出入港口
trans.tran_en: If goods of a particular kind are embargoed, people are not allowed to import them from a particular country or export them to a particular country
